alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Carter County through 300 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Ridgeway, or 26 miles south of Ekalaka, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Carter County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
